h3.a: PIAA CANCELS SPRING SPORTS SEASON/WATCH VIDEO TRIBUTE TO SPRING SENIOR STUDENT-ATHLETES

div.h5: “Our mission is to empower our students to be lifelong learners in order to reach their greatest potential.”

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_border_width_3 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_black

h4.strong: PRE-K AND HEAD START APPLICATIONS DUE

div.p: For those families that received Pre-K/Head Start Applications, please return them as soon as possible. If you mail them, please put ‘Re: PreK Application’ in the lower left corner of the envelope.

div.h4: (UPDATED 3/2/2020 with information from the Joint Board Presentation)

div.p: Safe2Say Something is a youth violence prevention program run by the Pennsylvania Office of Attorney General.
The Upper Dauphin Area School District thanks the Peyton Walker Foundation for its donation of an AED for Ralph Lehman Memorial Field which the school uses for home baseball contests.
